channel.title: NyxOnline [Dev Thread]
channel.description:
Before you ask any questions; Look [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,612755.0.html]here[/url] at the server development thread. This threads soul purpose is to recruit members onto my team. [b]The Team[/b] [ul][li]Website Development:[/li][list] [li]Jal Knight[/li][li]Sk8rdude461[/li][/list] [li]Client Development:[/li][list] [li]Sk8rdude461[/li][li]JavaLearner[/li][/list] [li]Server Development:[/li][list] [li]Sk8rdude461[/li][li]JavaLearner[/li][/list] [li]Advertisement:[/li][list] [li]Open[/li][/list][/ul] [b]The Application:[/b]
[ol][li]What name do you go by (username in game)?[/li] [li]What are you applying for?[/li] [li]Background in that position:[/li] [li]Other experience (Different programming languages, etc):[/li] [li]Other information we should know:[/li][/ol]
[b]If you'd like to be a beta tester. Please PM me and I'll send you a link to the forums.[/b]

item.title: NyxOnline [Dev Thread]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“cullman, post:39, topic:495744”]What name do you go by (username in game)? Cull and I am a 20 y/o student
What are you applying for? Client/Server developer
Background in that position: Not that much, I recently downloaded a source and client and im just looking over the some of the code and it looks challenging but with a little guidance i can figure things out. I am sure that I can work as a team to make efficient code.
Other experience (Different programming languages, etc): C/C++, Java, HTML5, CSS.
Other information we should know: I’ve been going to school for programming in the CIS field and I am looking to actually start working on projects and such with people and i feel like RSPS’s are a good place to really test and debug code in a real way.[/quote]
I don’t really need another developer right now. The only way you’d get considered is if you have some outstanding background knowledge in Java.

Read full topic

item.title: NyxOnline [Dev Thread]
item.dc:creator: @Compulsion Compulsion
item.description:
@Compulsion wrote:

1.What name do you go by (username in game)? Beau, or blessthefall

2.What are you applying for? Server Developer

3.Background in that position:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IVxitRCcTA8[/youtube]
I use to develop a server called “Acrylicx”. It was big during Summer 2012. It hit a maximum of 70 players online all at once which was a huge milestone since I programmed the server and my best with the client. To check out the most impressive thing I programmed for the server was the MP3 login music . It was something small since I got the MP3 class and the source code that actually played the MP3, but I was able to code to stop the music on log in and start when logged back out. Yes it’s client work. Most of the server development was mostly bug fixes, however that was almost nearly a year ago in 3 months, and I’ve learned another language Python which made my understanding of Java better. I also programmed a really interactive donating dialogue between NPC and player. It was a better idea than having a command, since it would spam the server with requests and cause the server too have some lag spikes. So I made the dialogue which had options and a whole conversation. Using conditional statements so the conversation between NPC and player would seem almost like in Runescape conversation. Programming it wasn’t hard, thinking of quick solution to the lap spikes was difficult and the results of my idea were successful. I also know how to make interfaces, both client and server sided.

4.Other experience (Different programming languages, etc): Python, I’m still learning and getting comfortable with the simple syntax.

5.Other information we should know: I’m not even a decent programmer, nor am I clueless about programming. I want to make this project a learning experience more than aiming for the big picture. Currently I have an unused vBulletin 4 license and it would be nice addition to the project.

Read full topic

item.title: NyxOnline [Dev Thread]
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

What name do you go by (username in game)?: Nolan

What are you applying for?: Advertisement Team

Background in that position: I was on the Advertisement Team for T.U.Pk.S (Owned by Arham 4)

Other experience (Different programming languages, etc): I have experience with developmental aspects of servers including Co-Developer of Final Judgement with Loveandpower, although that is irrelevant to the position I am applying for. I was also a Moderator on Nividia for Encryption, and a few other “less-known” servers.

Other information we should know: I am 18 years old, and I can get along with anyone.

Good luck with your project!

Read full topic

What are you applying for?: Gfx Artist
Background in that position: Tell me what you want and I will design you it if possible.
Other experience (Different programming languages, etc): I’ve been graphic designer for more as a year now (Had a break though)
Other information we should know: www.spotsfx.carbonmade.com is my portofolio, it isn’t that good but there’s some good work D:

Well, we don’t really have a gfx position in need. But I’m sure we could pair up with an advertiser to make fancy threads and stuff.
[/quote]
How about sprites and shit? lol[/quote]

But I could see how that would work.

item.title: NyxOnline [Dev Thread]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Fantasyoffate, post:17, topic:495744”][quote author=brad simpson298 link=topic=613976.msg4240308#msg4240308 date=1361786240]
What name do you go by (username in game)? Poak
What are you applying for? Server development also community management if i can.
Background in that position: I use to help code a sever about 3-4 months ago called perfectscape also handled all the community like forums post and stuff like that.
Other experience (Different programming languages, etc):
Other information we should know: I have skype or msn. I’m active on my pc alot after school and work. I normally get about 5-7 hours on weekday and I’m on pretty much all weekend.

Hope to hear from you soon
[/quote]
That’s exact same thing he said when replying to my post xd but he quit cuz I was sleeping And not answering him
OT sh8erdude you shouldn’t do all those positions on your own hire some new people I’m doing 2 projects ATM in sure I can do a 3rd

Username ingame:nessie312
Desired position: my strength is website developing and graphics design
Experience: 2 years of HTML/php and 4 years java but I’m horrible at java
Other: I am willing to finance by putting $10 a month for advertising making it professional if you have Skype add Nessie.rsps1

Edit: I also do a bit of model making I’ve kind of quit that but I might come back to it[/quote]
Uhhm… What?

You state that you’re horrible at java, why? That turns people away from your applications. Always state your pro’s, not cons.
You spelled my name wrong, which again, is a flaw that turns people away.
You never really stated the position you want.
And on top of all that you have other projects you’re dedicated to.

I’m not trying to be mean or rude. But you need to take an application seriously.

Other than that, you can find my skype here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“ownerbasgar, post:18, topic:495744”]I can help u with anything u want add me on FACEBOOK:

Yenthe haesevoets[/quote]
No. If you’re not going to take the time to follow my application layout, don’t go for any position.

Read full topic
